name: The Basement (Nicolas Beeler)
description:
Four keys are hidden inside a pitch-dark basement. Find them to unlock the door and escape, but beware... you are not alone.

The game takes a while to load. Have fun!

We used this asset for the tiles: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/rogue-fantasy-castle-16472...
And the zombie from this one: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/2d-roguelike-...

Programmer 1: Alexander Cvetanovic
Programmer 2: Nicolas Beeler
Sound Artist: Pascal Wohlwender
